Description:
Detects tampering with attachment manager settings policies attachments (See reference for more information)

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Potential Attachment Manager Settings Attachments Tamper
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (target_object like '%\software\microsoft\windows\currentversion\policies\attachments\%' and ((target_object like '%\savezoneinformation' and details = 'dword (0x00000002)') or (target_object like '%\scanwithantivirus' and details = 'dword (0x00000001)') or (target_object like '%\hidezoneinfoonproperties' and details = 'dword (0x00000001)')))
